alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:02PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Price County through 615 PM CDT... At 602 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Fifield, to 10 miles northwest of Willow Lake, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Price County, including the following locations... Pike Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
